attributes.action: Stop JUST EAT charging 50 pence per order paying by card / cash for online order
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-40648641

This is get around the ban the government has put in place from the 13 of January 2018 banning charge for paying by cards
attributes.background:
Currently just eat charge customer 50 pence card fee per order when paying online with card. 

What they are planning to do from 8th January 2018 is to charge 50 pence (wording it now as admin fee) to all customers ordering online regardless if the order is paid or not.

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on Just Eat to take action, not the UK Government or Parliament.
